SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.server

Class VirtualPlayerView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.server.VirtualPlayerView
public class VirtualPlayerView extends Object
This class is a virtual view for a player in the server. It is used to send commands to the server controller and to receive updates from the server controller.

    • VirtualPlayerView

      public VirtualPlayerView (@NotNull @NotNull ServerPlayerConnector connector, @NotNull @NotNull String nickname)

  • Method Details

    • setNumOfPlayers

      public void setNumOfPlayers (int numOfPlayers) throws NumOfPlayersException, NotGodPlayerException, GameStatusException
      Used by the client to set the number of players in the game.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - the number of players to play with
      Throws:
      NumOfPlayersException - if the number of players is not valid
      NotGodPlayerException - if the player is not a god player
      GameStatusException - if the game status is not valid, for example, if it's ongoing

    • setStarterCard

      public void setStarterCard (boolean isRetro) throws GameStatusException
      Used by the client to set a previously given StarterCard.
      Parameters:
      isRetro - true if the starter card is placed on the retro side, false if it's placed on the front side
      Throws:
      GameStatusException - if the game status is not valid, for example, if it's ongoing

    • setObjectiveCard

      public void setObjectiveCard (int cardId) throws IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException, PlayerInitException, GameStatusException
      Used by the client to choose between the previously given candidate ObjectiveCard (2 for standard rules).
      Parameters:
      cardId - the id of the objective card to set
      Throws:
      IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException - if the player is not allowed to set the objective
      PlayerInitException - if the player is not initialized
      GameStatusException - if the game status is not valid, for example, if it's ongoing

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard (int cardId, int x, int y, boolean isRetro) throws TurnsOrderException, PlayerInitException, IllegalCardPlacingException, NotInHandException, IllegalPlateauActionException, GameStatusException
      Used by the client to place a card on his field.
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the card to place
      x - x position of Position
      y - y position of Position
      isRetro - true if to place on the retro, false otherwise
      Throws:
      TurnsOrderException - if it's not the turn of this player
      PlayerInitException - if the player has not been initialized
      IllegalCardPlacingException - if it's not allowed to place a card in that location
      NotInHandException - if the card trying to place is not in hand
      IllegalPlateauActionException - if player not found
      GameStatusException - if the status of the game doesn't allow placing of cards

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard (boolean fromVisible, @NotNull @NotNull PlayableCardType type, int cardId) throws IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException, TurnsOrderException, IllegalPickActionException, PlayerInitException, EmptyDeckException, MaxHandSizeException, GameStatusException
      Used by the client to draw a card either from deck or from a table of visible cards
      Parameters:
      fromVisible - true if to draw from visible, false otherwise
      type - type of the card GOLD or RESOURCE
      cardId - id of the card to draw if from visible
      Throws:
      IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException - if you can't draw the card
      TurnsOrderException - if it's not your turn
      IllegalPickActionException - if the card is not on the table
      PlayerInitException - if the player doesn't exist
      EmptyDeckException - if the deck is empty
      MaxHandSizeException - if the hand is full
      GameStatusException - if the game status doesn't allow drawing

    • syncMeUp

      public void syncMeUp()
      Used by the client if it need a complete retransmission of the game data.

    • updatePlayer

      public void updatePlayer (@NotNull @NotNull CandidateObjectiveEvent event)
      Sends to the client a set of candidate objectives
      Parameters:
      event - the event containing the candidate objectives

    • updatePlayer

      public void updatePlayer (@NotNull @NotNull HandChangeEvent event)
      Sends to the client a change in hand.

      It can be a remove action when placing or a draw action during drawing phase.

      Parameters:
      event - the event containing the hand change

    • updatePlayer

      public void updatePlayer (@NotNull @NotNull PersonalObjectiveChangeEvent event)
      Sends to the player the confirmation of the chosen objective.
      Parameters:
      event - the event containing the personal objective chosen

    • updatePlayer

      public void updatePlayer (@NotNull @NotNull StarterCardEvent event)
      Sends to the player the starter card given after which they will need to choose in with front to place it.
      Parameters:
      event - the event containing a starter card

    • updatePlayer

      public void updatePlayer (@NotNull @NotNull ReconnectionEvent event)
      Sends to the player all information that should be available.

      This does not include private information, like other players' hand or the deck order of cards.

      Parameters:
      event - the event containing all the information of the current game.
